gst.data

Class AnnotationController

  • java.lang.Object
    • gst.data.DataController
      • gst.data.AnnotationController

  • public class AnnotationController
extends DataController
    Buffered DataController implementation for EventEntry-type data in an UnisensDataset.
    Version:
    0.2.5.3 (15.10.2012)
    Author:
    Enrico Grunitz
    See Also:
    DataController

        public AnnotationList getAnnotation(double time,
                           double range)
        Returns a List of annotations that are between time - range and time + range.
        Parameters:
        time - central point in time
        range - time range value
        Returns:
        list of found annotations

      • getAnnotations

        public AnnotationList getAnnotations(double startTime,
                            double endTime)
        Description copied from class: DataController
        Returns a List of the annotations of controlled Entry. All annotations are between startTime and endTime. If the entry doesn't has annotations null is returned.
        Specified by:
        getAnnotations in class DataController
        Parameters:
        startTime - beginning time
        endTime - ending time
        Returns:
        list of annotations or null
        See Also:
        DataController.getAnnotations(double, double)

      • getDataPoints

        public org.jfree.data.xy.XYSeries getDataPoints(double startTime,
                                       double endTime,
                                       int maxPoints)
        Description copied from class: DataController
        Returns the data points as an XYSeries. All data points are between startTime and endTime.
        Specified by:
        getDataPoints in class DataController
        Parameters:
        startTime - beginning time
        endTime - ending time
        maxPoints - number of maximum data points
        Returns:
        the array of data points or null if there are only annotations
        See Also:
        DataController.getDataPoints(double, double, int)
